Name: Usage Report
Description: This Type represents a period of time and holds the specified user's unit usage for this period.

Fields.Name: Unit of Time
Fields.Description: The unit of time that this report covers.

Fields.Name: Identifier
Fields.Description: The date and time identifier of the period.

Fields.Name: Usage
Fields.Description: The usage amounts for the intervals in the period.

Fields.Name: Total Usage
Fields.Description: The total number of units used in the period.
